Thunder Wave.moveDescription: A weak electric shock that paralyzes the target.

Fire Fang.moveDescription: The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. It may leave the target with a burn. TODO add 10% flinch as well

Ice Beam.moveDescription: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. It may also freeze the target solid.

Slash.moveDescription: The target is attacked with a slash of claws or blades. Critical hits land more easily.

Quick Attack.moveDescription: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. This move always goes first.

Extreme Speed.moveDescription: The user charges the target at blinding speed. This attack always goes before any other move.

Aerial Ace.moveDescription: The user confounds the foe with speed, then slashes. The attack lands without fail.

Swords Dance.moveDescription: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. This sharply raises the user's Attack stat.

Dragon Dance.moveDescription: User raises their attack and speed by 1 stage. In other words. SKRRAAA ME DRAGON.

Growl.moveDescription: The user growls in an endearing way, making opposing Pokémon less wary. This lowers their Attack stats.

Baby-Doll Eyes.moveDescription: The user stares at the target with its baby-doll eyes, which lowers its Attack stat. This move always goes first.

Nasty Plot.moveDescription: The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts *Pause*. It sharply raises the user's Sp. Atk.

Calm Mind.moveDescription: The user calms their mind raising their Special Attack and Special Defense by 1 stage.

Flamethrower.moveDescription: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. This may also leave the target with a burn

Ember.moveDescription: The target is attacked with small flames. This may also leave the target with a burn.

Pyro Ball.moveDescription: The user attacks by igniting a small stone and launching it as a fiery ball at the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

Hydro Pump.moveDescription: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.

Water Gun.moveDescription: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

Razor Leaf.moveDescription: Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at the opposing Pokémon. Critical hits land more easily.

Thunderbolt.moveDescription: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target, giving it an electric shock. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

Thunder.moveDescription: TO BE IMPLEMENTED: Does not hit pokemon using fly and rain doesn't exist

Sleep Powder.moveDescription: The user scatters a big cloud of sleep-inducing dust around the target.

Swift.moveDescription: Star-shaped rays are shot at the opposing team. This attack never misses.

Bulldoze.moveDescription: The user strikes everything around it by stomping down on the ground. This lowers the Speed stats of those hit.

Agility.moveDescription: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. This sharply boosts its Speed stat.

Shadow Claw.moveDescription: The user attacks by slashing the target with a sharp claw made from shadows. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

Poison Jab.moveDescription: The target is stabbed with a tentacle, an arm, or the like steeped in poison. This may also poison the target.

Pin Missile.moveDescription: Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

Flare Blitz.moveDescription: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges the target. This also damages the user quite a lot. This attack may leave the target with a burn.

Double-Edge.moveDescription: A reckless, life-risking tackle. This also damages the user quite a lot.

Water Shuriken.moveDescription: The user hits the target with throwing stars two to five times in a row. This move always goes first.

Close Combat.moveDescription: The user fights the target up close without guarding itself. This also lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def stats.

Iron Head.moveDescription: The user slams the target with its steel-hard head. This may also make the target flinch.

Water Pulse.moveDescription: The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water. This may also confuse the target.

Fire Blast.moveDescription: The target is attacked with an intense blast of all- consuming fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.

Giga Drain.moveDescription: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

Mega Drain.moveDescription: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

Absorb.moveDescription: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

Bite.moveDescription: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. This may also make the target flinch.

Air Cutter.moveDescription: The user launches razor-like wind to slash opposing Pokémon. Critical hits land more easily.

Air Slash.moveDescription: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. This may also make the target flinch.

Leech Life.moveDescription: The user drains the target's blood. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

Steel Wing.moveDescription: The target is hit with wings of steel. This may also raise the user's Defense stat.

Crunch.moveDescription: The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

Heat Wave.moveDescription: The user attacks by exhaling hot breath on opposing Pokémon. This may also leave those Pokémon with a burn.

Brave Bird.moveDescription: The user tucks in its wings and charges from a low altitude. This also damages the user quite a lot.

Zen Headbutt.moveDescription: The user focuses its willpower to its head and attacks the target. This may also make the target flinch.

Stun Spore.moveDescription: The user scatters a cloud of numbing powder that paralyzes the target.

Moon Blast.moveDescription: Borrowing the power of the moon, the user attacks the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Atk stat.

Bullet Seed.moveDescription: The user forcefully shoots seeds at the target two to five times in a row.

Energy Ball.moveDescription: The user draws power from nature and fires it at the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

Dazzling Gleam.moveDescription: Should hit multiple opposing pokemon but doesn't. The user damages opposing Pokémon by emitting a powerful flash.

Facade.moveDescription: This attack move doubles its power if the user is poisoned, burned, or paralyzed. NOT YET IMPLEMENTED

Venoshock.moveDescription: DMG SHOULD BE DOUBLED IF POISONED. The user drenches the target in a special poisonous liquid. This move's power is doubled if the target is poisoned.

Tickle.moveDescription: The user tickles the target into laughing, reducing its Attack and Defense stats.

Body Slam.moveDescription: The user drops onto the target with its full body weight. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

Play Rough.moveDescription: The user plays rough with the target and attacks it. This may also lower the target's Attack stat.

Psychic.moveDescription: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

Dragon Pulse.moveDescription: The target is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user's gaping mouth.

Rock Smash.moveDescription: (Note: I'm guessing rock smash has 25 PP).The user attacks with a punch that can shatter a rock. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

Earth Power.moveDescription: (Note: I'm guessing earth power has 10 PP). The user makes the ground under the foe erupt with power. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def.
